paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a KCNH2 variant associated with long QT syndrome in a pediatric case.

patients.phenotype: Long QT syndrome, complete atrioventricular block

individual_records.phenotype_details: Presented with syncope, complete AVB, prolonged QT interval, and TDP.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: This case led us to review our prenatal therapeutic strategy for such patients and examine the postnatal therapy plan for this patient who presented with TDP and an extremely high possibility of SCD.

functional_data.summary: The variant is considered pathogenic due to amino acid sequence changes and a loss of helix superstructure.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is de novo; neither parent carried this variant.
variants.additional_notes: This is the first report of this variant.
key_quotes: Genetic testing revealed KCNH2 c.2483G>A variant–induced LQTS.
The variant we identified, KCNH2 c.2483G>A, had not been reported in any population; this is the first report of this variant.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the KCNH2 variant was extracted from the main text.
